entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Becoming mainly cloudy near midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:13 PM CDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:13 PM CDT Sunday 16 April 2023
